# 
When writing a grant contact your business deveploment officer for help?!?

# Things to consider
* How much data storage and data archiving will I need for my project for how long?
* Does my funding body requires me to write a Data managemnt plan (pre or post award)?
* Should my project be in the Grampian Data Safe Haven (DaSH)
